Serialized Form

  • Package gui

    • Class gui.ButtonPalette

      class ButtonPalette extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller
          Controller controller
          Responsible for handling user input.
        • images
          ImageStorage images
          Stores the images to place on the buttons (as well as other images).
        • indexOfLastSelectedTile
          int indexOfLastSelectedTile
          The buttons are stored in an array, and the this value stores the index of the last gate / tile / button that was clicked.

          Starts as -1 (could be any other value out of the array range) because otherwise the user could not select the button with this index in the array.

        • tileButtons
          JButton[] tileButtons
          The buttons for selecting which tile to place.
        • tileTypes
          TileType[] tileTypes
          The types of tiles / gates which are placed when the corresponding button is selected.

    • Class gui.InfoWindow

      class InfoWindow extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

    • Class gui.LogicBoardGUI

      class LogicBoardGUI extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • boardHeight
          int boardHeight
          Stores the current number of rows in the model.
        • boardWidth
          int boardWidth
          Stores the current number of columns in the model.
        • buttonPalette
          ButtonPalette buttonPalette
          A scrollable pane with buttons, which allow the user to select which gate they want to place in the model.
        • canvas
          TiledCanvas canvas
          Display the actual model as a grid.
        • controller
          Controller controller
          The GUI informs the controller over user interactions, which the controller then processes.
        • DEFAULT_BOARD_HEIGHT
          int DEFAULT_BOARD_HEIGHT
          Specifies the default number of rows in the model.
        • DEFAULT_BOARD_WIDTH
          int DEFAULT_BOARD_WIDTH
          Specifies the default number of columns in the model.
        • images
          ImageStorage images
          Stores the images needed to display the gates.
        • menuBar
          LogicBoardMenu menuBar
          Contains all menus.
        • positionCalculator
          PositionCalculator positionCalculator
          Used for converting and examining mouse positions etc.
        • TILE_HEIGHT
          int TILE_HEIGHT
          Specifies the height of tiles used for visualization on the board. Tile sizes should match the size of the image files used.
        • TILE_WIDTH
          int TILE_WIDTH
          Specifies the width of tiles used for visualization on the board. Tile sizes should match the size of the image files used.

    • Class gui.LogicBoardMenu

      class LogicBoardMenu extends JMenuBar implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • aboutText
          String aboutText
          The text displayed in the About window.
        • aboutWindow
          JFrame aboutWindow
          A window for displaying information about the program.
        • controller
          Controller controller
          The controller can access information from the GUI and pass it on to the model.
        • helpText
          String helpText
          The text displayed in the Help window.
        • helpWindow
          JFrame helpWindow
          A window for displaying information on how to use this program.
        • menuItem_Redo
          JMenuItem menuItem_Redo
          The menu item in the "Edit" menu which can be used to redo undone commands (like placing gates etc.).
        • menuItem_Undo
          JMenuItem menuItem_Undo
          The menu item in the "Edit" menu which can be used to undo commands (like placing gates etc.).

    • Class gui.TiledCanvas

      class TiledCanvas extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • boardGUI
          LogicBoardGUI boardGUI
          The GUI parent this GUI element sits on.
        • connectionsToDraw
          ArrayList<PointTupleWithStatus> connectionsToDraw
          Store the endpoints of each connection that needs to be drawn. That information is provided by the model.
        • customGreen
          Color customGreen
          Color used for connections, where the output at the start of the connection is TRUE.
        • customRed
          Color customRed
          Color used for connections, where the output at the start of the connection is FALSE.
        • drawTentativeLine
          boolean drawTentativeLine
          True iff a line to preview a connection should be drawn.
        • emptyTileImage
          BufferedImage emptyTileImage
          The image of an empty tile (i.e. a cell without a gate) will be needed very often, so store it.
        • images
          ImageStorage images
          Basically a look-up table for the images of the tiles that can be placed on the board.
        • lineEnd
          Vector2Int lineEnd
          The end of the line for previewing a connection (i.e. the current mouse cursor position).
        • lineStart
          Vector2Int lineStart
          The start of the line for previewing a connection.
        • startedDragging
          boolean startedDragging
          True iff the user clicked any mouse button over the output or an input of a gate on the board and is still pressing the button.
        • tileHeight
          int tileHeight
          The height of an individual tile / cell / gate image (in pixels).
        • tilesToDraw
          TreeMap<Vector2Int,TileType> tilesToDraw
          Store the positions and the types of gates to draw. That information is provided by the model.
        • tileWidth
          int tileWidth
          The width of an individual tile / cell / gate image (in pixels).
